thread.title: Tottenham boss Mauricio Pochettino remains coy on Barcelona links as pressure on Luis Enrique increases
thread.title_full: Tottenham boss Mauricio Pochettino remains coy on Barcelona links as pressure on Luis Enrique increases

author: Liam Corless
title: Tottenham boss Mauricio Pochettino remains coy on Barcelona links as pressure on Luis Enrique increases
text:
Sport Tottenham boss Mauricio Pochettino remains coy on Barcelona links as pressure on Luis Enrique increases There could be a vacancy in Catalonia at the end of the season if Enrique, as expected, leaves his role as Barca boss Share Mauricio Pochettino wouldn't be drawn on the prospect of becoming Barcelona's next manager (Photo: Dean Mouhtaropoulos) Share Get FC Barcelona     
Mauricio Pochettino has refused to comment on speculation linking him with the Barcelona manager's job. 
Current Blaugrana boss Luis Enrique is under mounting pressure at the Nou Camp after his players were thrashed 4-0 by PSG in the first leg of their Champions League last-16 tie on Tuesday. 
Spanish media reports say Barcelona's biggest players have lost faith in Enrique, who is widely expected to leave the club when his contract expires in the summer. 
Legendary former Barca player and current Everton manager Ronald Koeman is in the frame to take over from Enrique, while Spurs boss Pochettino has forged himself a reputation as one of the most promising young managers in European football since taking over at White Hart Lane in 2014. Read More Pochettino, right, is one of the most highly-rated young coaches in Europe (Photo: Getty) Luis Enrique is expected to leave Barcelona at the end of the season (Photo: REUTERS) The Blaugrana are reeling from a 4-0 drubbing by PSG on Tuesday night (Photo: REUTERS) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
